name: Miraclx OS
tagline: The official repository for the Miraclx OS
body:
### Welcome to Miraclx OS.

Miraclx OS has been created,
as a toy without a user
Now its going into your hands
Designed to work in your path
Fulfil your every expectations
And make you think less about any other OS


Here's a list of included programs
• Pamac (Add/Remove Software; Software Update)
• File Roller (Archive Manager)
• Gnome-Calculator
• Gnome-Calendar
• Cheese
• Gnome-Disks
• Baobab (Disk Usage Analyzer)
• Evince (Document Viewer)
• Nautilus / Nemo (Files)
• FileZilla
• Uncomplicated Firewall (Firewall Configuration)
• Font Viewer
• Gedit
• GIMP
• Google Chrome
• Ice (Peppermint's Site Specific Browser Tool)
• Eye of Gnome (Image Viewer)
• Inkscape
• LibreOffice
• Gnome-Photos
• PlayOnLinux
• Rhythmbox
• Orca (Screen Reader)
• Gnome-Screenshot
• Settings
• Simple Backup
• Steam
• Syncthing
• System Log
• System Monitor
• Gnome-Terminal
• Transmission
• Tweak Tool (Only on Gnome)
• Totem (Gnome-Videos)

### System Requirements
  RAM: 4.00 GB
  Internal Storage: 50 GB
  CPU: 2.5 GHz

####Download Size: 2.5 GB

### Go to site#  !
[Go to site](http://www.miraclxos.ml)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
